attributes.action: Return all inheritance over £1Million to the Exchequer
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Inheritance tax should be modified, such that no tax is paid below £1Million, but over that figure ALL cash estate to the value of should be returned to the Exchequer. 

Too much money is tied up with old money especially Royal Family and large estate owners and it's poor economic practice to keep such large amounts tied to so few people.
